# @param {Integer[]} nums
# @param {Integer} k
# @return {Integer}
def min_changes(nums, k)
  diff = Array.new(nums.size / 2){
    (nums[_1] - nums[-1 - _1]).abs
  }
  count = diff.tally
  group = count.keys.group_by{count[_1]}
  result = nums.size
  group.keys.sort_by{-_1}.each{|key|
    break if diff.size - key >= result
    m = group[key].min
    r = 0
    diff.size.times{|i|
      next if diff[i] == m
      if diff[i] > m
        r += 1
        next
      end
      if [nums[i], nums[-1 - i]].max >= m || k - [nums[i], nums[-1 - i]].min >= m
        r += 1
        next
      end
      r += 2
    }
    result = r if result > r
  }
  result
end
